title: User wants to receive error when placing player with submitted waiver request on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player
AND selected player has a submitted waiver request (Request Bulletin not yet sent) with Request Date on or after the Injury Date on the DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Player with a submitted waiver request may not be assigned. The waiver request should be deleted before re-submitting the assignment."
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx

BOC should NOT be able to override this error

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has previously secured waivers on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player
AND player has any secured waivers (waivers in effect on profile) as of the Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Previously secured {0} waivers for this player will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
AND {0} should be replaced with the waiver type
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with tx

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has any pending waiver requests on 7 Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club or BOC user
AND user is attempting to Submit a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player
AND selected player has a pending waiver request (Claimed WvResultStatus or no RequestResult)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve" (all places OnSubmit rules are fired)
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw error "Player has pending {0} waiver request(s) that will be cancelled as a result of this placement."
AND {0} should be replaced with the waiver type
AND Clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with tx

title: Allow BOC user to approve a place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL transaction has been submitted to the BOC
AND transaction is in  Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected status
AND blue "Approve" button is available
custom_steps:
WHEN the BOC user clicks "Approve"
AND all rules have passed or been overridden
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND item is reloaded in view mode if it was in edit mode
AND a successful blue notification (#80) is displayed that states the transaction was approved
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = DL07J Description = Place on 7-day Concussion DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields should be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status is set to 7-Day Concussion DL

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has Claimed waivers on 7 Day Concussion DL before Withdrawal Expiration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a claimed TRD waiver Request for a player
AND no WCA has been submitted for the player
AND user is attempting to submit/approve a Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for this player 
AND injury date is either before waiver request date OR between waiver request date and Withdrawal Period Expiration date
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw warning “Player has claimed TRD waiver request that will be cancelled as a result of this placement.” 
AND if user overrides the warning the player's waivers will be cancelled on approve of the DL placement

title: User wants to print Notice of Disposition for Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User that has permission to Print from the form will see a "Print" button
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks print on the tx in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN it will open a menu where the user can choose whether they want to print a Concussion Diagnostic Form or print a Notice of Disposition
AND selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish
AND selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish 
AND the English pdf will follow the English Notice of Disposition format
AND the Spanish pdf will follow the Spanish Notice of Disposition format

title: User wants to print Concussion Diagnostic Form for Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User that has permission to Print from the form will see a "Print" button
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks print on the tx in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN it will open a menu where the user can choose whether they want to print a Concussion Diagnostic Form or print a Notice of Disposition. 
AND selecting "Concussion Diagnostic Form" will generate a pdf of a pre-populated CDF per the specifications with the player information from their profile and the Concussion DL transaction.

title: As a user I want to be able to create a new Place on 10-Day DL transaction for a player from their Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user clicks "Create New" button on the Player History widget for all players. 

cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting "Place on 10-Day DL" from the Create New will check to see if there is an existing Preliminary, Submitted or Rejected Place on 10-Day DL transaction for the same player created within 10 days of the current date.
custom_expected:
THEN If a preliminary or rejected place on 10-day DL transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in Edit Mode instead of opening a new transaction. 
OR If a submitted transaction already exists, the system will load the existing transaction in View Mode instead of opening a new transaction.
OR If no preliminary, submitted or rejected transaction created within the last 10 days already exists, then the system will load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode. 
AND Transaction should follow the wireframe and data discovery.

title: As a user I want to submit a place on 10-day DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
Given user has created and submitted “DL transaction” to BOC for Approval 

cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl
custom_steps:
Log in as BOC select the player that has “DL transaction” submitted for approval


See Business Rules: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676
custom_expected:
* Submit to BOC button is available to Club users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button is blue. 
* Submit button is available for BOC users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button is grey.
* Clicking Submit will run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message. 
* Clicking Submit will run the On Submit rules check (each covered in other stories - this story assumes they all pass).
* After the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"
* System reloads the transaction in view mode, and displays a successful submit blue notification. 
* Once the transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in Player's Player History: Code = DL10J, Description = Place on 10-day DL
* From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields [required]
* Entry appears in green font
* Once the transaction has successfully been submitted, the system sets the player's pending major league roster status to "10-Day DL"

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to reject a place on 10-day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in as a BOC and there is a “DL Transaction” with the status of “Submitted to BOC”

cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl
custom_steps:
When Clicking “Reject”


See Rejection Updates: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

See Button Guidelines: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2281404

See Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676
custom_expected:
* BOC Approvers see a "Reject" button in grey when they are viewing a transaction (in view or edit mode) in the Submitted to BOC state. 
* Clicking "Reject" will run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages (all covered in previous stories). 
* Once all On Save rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
* Successful reject notification is displayed. See Messages #78.
* If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard. 
* Reverse player's pending Major League Roster status.
* Remove pending player history entry.
* Remove any action items that were generated regarding the transaction.

title: As a BOC user I want to approve a place on 10-day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
Given a user is logged in as BOC and there is a DL Transaction with a status “Submitted to BOC”

cba change, disabled list, mj - place on 10 day dl
custom_steps:
When Click “Approve”


See Approval Updates: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2351723

See Messages: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=2309676
custom_expected:
* Once all rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
* If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode. 
* A successful blue notification is displayed that states the transaction was approved. 
* Player's Player History Update: Code = DL10J Description = Place on 10-day DL, From Org/Club and to Org/Club fields to be in black font.

custom_preconds:

custom_expected:

title: Reject a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: BOC user approves 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field, formatting, on Submit, and on Approve rules checks
AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = DL60J Description = Place on 60-day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status should be set to 60-Day DL

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has Claimed waivers on 60 Day DL before Withdrawal Expiration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a claimed TRD waiver Request for a player
AND no WCA has been submitted for the player
AND user is attempting to submit/approve a Place on 60 Day DL tx for this player 
AND injury date is either before waiver request date OR between waiver request date and Withdrawal Period Expiration date
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw warning “Player has claimed TRD waiver request that will be cancelled as a result of this placement.” 
AND if user overrides the warning the player's waivers will be cancelled on approve of the DL placement

title: As a user I want to submit a Transfer to the 10-Day DL to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user is attempting to submit a Transfer to 10-Day DL tx for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user has navigated to the form in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN Submit to BOC button should be available to Club users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button should be blue
AND Submit button should be available for BOC users when the preliminary or rejected form is in edit mode or view mode. The button should be grey
AND clicking Submit should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message
AND clicking Submit should run the On Submit rules check (each covered in other stories - this story assumes they all pass)
AND after the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the transaction to "Submitted to BOC"  
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful submit blue notification. Messages #76
AND if the player's pending MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL then their pending MJ Roster Status should be set to to Rehab 10 Day DL
AND if the player's pending MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion DL then the player's pending MJ roster status should be set to to 10 Day DL
AND once the transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = TR10J, Description = Transfer to 10-Day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND when a transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC" an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND if a file is attached to the transaction, that should be displayed and available for download from the Attachments column of the Approvals widget
AND if Comments are populated on the transaction, they should display in the Comments column of the Approvals widget
AND player name should be a hyperlink in the Approvals widget
AND clicking on the player name should open the Player Profile (defaults to Player History tab) in the same window/tab
AND  "Type" should be a hyperlink
AND clicking on the type hyperlink of a submitted transaction should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: As a BOC user I want to approve or reject a transfer to 10-day DL transaction
custom_preconds:
cba change, disabled list, mj dl - transfer to 10 day dl

GIVEN that BOC wants to Approve or Reject a Transfer
custom_steps: WHEN BOC is viewing a transaction(in view or edit mode) in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC or Rejected state.
custom_expected:
THEN
   APPROVE:
* BOC Approvers will see an "Approve" button in blue when Transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC and Rejected states.
* Clicking "Approve" will run all required field, formatting, On Submit and On Approve rules checks and display any relevant error or warning messages.
* Once all rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Approved"
* If the item was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode.
* A successful blue notification is displayed that states the transaction was approved. See Messages #80.
* If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard.
* Update Player's Player History: Code = TR10J Description = Transfer to 10-Day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.
* If the player’s current MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL, then set the player's MJ Roster Status to Rehab 10 Day DL.
* If the player's current MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion DL, then set the player's MJ roster status to 10 Day DL
OR
   REJECT:
* BOC Approvers will see a "Reject" button in grey when they are viewing a transaction in the Submitted to BOC state only.
* Clicking "Reject" will run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages (all covered in previous stories).
* Once all On Save rules have passed or been overridden, the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
* Successful reject notification is displayed. See Messages #78.
* If the item was on the Approvals Clipboard, that is removed from the approvals clipboard.
* Reverse player's pending Major League Roster status.
* Remove pending player history entry.
* Remove any action items that were generated regarding the transaction.

title: BOC user wants to approve a Transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = TR60J Description = Transfer to 60-Day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font.
AND if player's current MJ roster status is Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL or Rehab 15-Day DL, then system should set MJ roster status to "Rehab 60Day DL"
AND if player's current MJ roster status is 7-Day Concussion DL or 15-Day DL then system should set MJ roster status to "60 Day DL"

title: BOC user wants to reverse a transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND any action items generated by the transaction should be removed
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction

title: BOC user wants to suppress a reversed transfer to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Transfer to 60-Day DL" transaction exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: BOC user wants to approve Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:

AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state

title: BOC user wants to approve a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a "Return from Rehab" tx has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = RHBRT Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Rehab 60 Day DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 60 Day DL.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 7 Day Concussion DL.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Rehab 15 Day DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 15 Day DL.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Restricted/Assigned, then player's MJ roster status should be set to Restricted.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Suspended/Assigned, then player's MJ roster status should be set to Suspended.
AND Rehab Club should be set to null

title: User wants reinstating a player from the DL to update their information on the Recertifications tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has been reinstated from the DL
custom_expected:
THEN "Reinstatement Date" column should only be populated once the player has been Reinstated from the DL
AND "Reinstatement Date" column should have the Reinstatement Date entered on their Reinstatement for this DL placement
AND the "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND if the Reinstatement Date is on or before any of the Recertification Due dates listed - these dates should be removed from the form

title: As a user I want to be able to sort the Recertification utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Recertification utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the header of any column in the Recertification screen
custom_expected:
THEN system will sort by the column. 
AND For the Recert due column, the sort should be on the first date displayed. 
AND Column headers should now be blue
AND The column being sorted on should have global styling added(grey background and the red up/down arrow next to the column header)

AND no approvals item should be generated for this transaction either since this transaction is auto-approved

title: User wants to receive error when placing player who has Claimed waivers on MN 60 Day DL before Withdrawal Expiration
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a claimed TRD waiver Request for a player
AND no WCA has been submitted for the player
AND user is attempting to submit/approve a Place on MN 60 Day DL tx for this player 
AND injury date is either before waiver request date OR between waiver request date and Withdrawal Period Expiration date
custom_expected:
THEN system should throw warning “Player has claimed TRD waiver request that will be cancelled as a result of this placement.” 
AND if user overrides the warning the player's waivers will be cancelled on approve of the DL placement

title: BOC user approves Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Reinstate from DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field, formatting, on Submit, and on Approve rules checks
AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History should be updated: Code = REINS Description = Reinstate From {Disabled List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's MJ roster status should be set to Active

title: User wants to print Notice of Disposition for Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN Users have permission to Print from the form will see a "Print" button on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks print on the tx in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a menu will open where the user can choose to print a Notice of Disposition. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND Selecting "Notice of Disposition" will generate a pdf of the Notice of Disposition in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The English pdf will follow the English Notice of Disposition format.
AND The Spanish pdf will follow the Spanish Notice of Disposition format.

title: BOC user wants to reject a Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on Rehabilitation Assignment" tx to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Minor League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed

title: User wants to submit a Return from Rehab tx to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Return from Rehab" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful save blue notification #76
AND If the player’s pending MJ roster status is Rehab 60 Day DL, then set the player’s MJ pending roster status to 60 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Rehab 7 Day DL, then it should be set to 7 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Restricted/Assigned then it should be set to Restricted.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Suspended/Assigned then it should be set to Suspended.
AND system should create an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = RHBRT, Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Minor Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should be displayed in the comments column of the Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Return from Rehab tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Return from Rehab" tx reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Return from Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: BOC user wants to approve Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = RHBTR  Description = Transfer of Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's Rehab Club should be set to the Assignment Club

title: BOC user wants to be able to reverse Transfer of Rehab Assignment tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Transfer from Rehab Assignment" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction
AND player's Club, MJ and MN Roster statuses, and level of play should update to their values from prior to the transaction being approved

title: As a user I want to be able to run the DL Recert Report from Recertification screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Recertification utility
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the "DL Recertification" tab for BOC and Club users
custom_expected:
THEN there is a "Run Report" button. 
AND Clicking this will launch the report prompt for the DL Recertification Maintenance report.
AND The prompt should default to the current year and allow the user to adjust the parameters and run the report, just like if they accessed this from the Report screen.

title: As a User, I want to Export the DL Summary Report to Excel
custom_preconds: GIVEN  EBIS1 "Run Excel Report" version of the "Disabled List Summary Report" has been replicated in EBIS2
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to reports widget
custom_expected:
THEN the popup to run the "Disabled List Summary Report" report should have a "Run Excel" button which generates this document
AND  columns and layout of the printed excel report will match ebis1

title: As a user, I want a custom reports popup for running the DL Summary Report from the reports widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to print DL Summary Report
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Disabled List Summary Report" link from the reports listing widget
custom_expected:
THEN a custom EBIS UI prompt modal should display (similar to modal for other reports)
AND prompt filters should match what's listed in the data discovery (https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5645+Report+Prompts)
AND running the report with the desired prompts should print the report matching the Details and Layout Listed in the wiki (https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5642+Report+Details , https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5641+Report+Layout)
